name: Where Is Here?
description:
Where is here? is a first-person exploration game set in an unknown world. 

We crashed landed with 1000 people in hibernation and we need to find help by sending SOS signals to our communications satellites to fly as soon as possible to our "New Home" destination. 

Your not alone while doing this task, your drone Jack will help you along the way. You also have your bird Sunny, who likes to fly between the trees. 

The place is unknown and different than Earth, so be on your guard! 

Good luck for succeeding your mission ;)  

follow me on twitter for future games:   Roxanna Stefaniuc Fabiola (@RoxannaFabiola) / Twitter
